title: Sound On: Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal Reached
itunes:title: Sound On: Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal Reached
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Bloomberg Government reporter Emily Wilkins, Jay Timmons, President and CEO of the National Association of Manufacturers, Democratic Pennsylvania Congressman Brendan Boyle, Hoover Institution Fellow Lanhee Chen, and Brandon Neal, former senior advisor to the U.S. Secretary of Transportation in the Obama administration.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
